item.title: Peterk add a quote by Salman Rushdie
item.description: "I am the sum total of everything that went before me, of all I have been seen done, of everything done-to-me. I am everyone everything whose being-in-the-world affected was affected by mine. I am anything that happens after I'm gone which would not have happened if I had not come." -- Salman Rushdie

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "I miss Nixon. Compared to these Nazis we have in the White House now, Richard Nixon was a flaming liberal." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "Never turn your back on fear. It should always be in front of you, like a thing that might have to be killed." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "There's a bluebird in my heart that wants to get out but I'm too tough for him, I say, stay in there, I'm not going to let anybody see you." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "Things get bad for all of us, almost continually, and what we do under the constant stress reveals who/what we are." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Taylor Mali
item.description:
"Falling In Love Is Like Owning A Dog.
Throw things away and love will bring them back, again, and again, and again. But most of all, love needs love, lots of it. And in return, love loves you and never stops." -- Taylor Mali

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Haruki Marukami
item.description: "Whatever it is you're seeking won't come in the form you're expecting." -- Haruki Marukami

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "A certain type of perfection can only be realized through a limitless accumulation of the imperfect." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Dreams come from the past, not from the future. Dreams shouldn't control you--you should control them. " -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Walter M. Miller Jr.
item.description: "You don’t <i>have</i> a soul, Doctor. You <i>are</i> a soul. You <i>have</i> a body, temporarily." -- Walter M. Miller Jr.

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Charles Schultz
item.description: "<b>I</b> love mankind ... it's <b>people</b> I can't stand!!" -- Charles Schultz

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you want your children to be intelligent, read them fairy tales. If you want them to be more intelligent, read them more fairy tales." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Rita Mae Brown
item.description: "The statistics on sanity are that one out of every four people is suffering from a mental illness. Look at your 3 best friends. If they're ok, then it's you." -- Rita Mae Brown

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Music was my refuge. I could crawl into the space between the notes and curl my back to loneliness." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Just for the record, the weather today is calm and sunny, but the air is full of bullshit." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "I like your Christ, I do not like your Christians. Your Christians are so unlike your Christ." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Nothing of me is original. I am the combined effort of everyone I've ever known." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Your heart is my piñata." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "There are only patterns, patterns on top of patterns, patterns that affect other patterns. Patterns hidden by patterns. Patterns within patterns. If you watch close, history does nothing but repeat itself. What we call chaos is just patterns we haven't recognized. What we call random is just patterns we can't decipher. what we can't understand we call nonsense. What we can't read we call gibberish. There is no free will. There are no variables." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "You can only hold a smile for so long, after that it's just teeth." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I want To do with you what spring does with the cherry trees." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "You grow up to become living proof of your parents' limitations. Their less-than masterpiece." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Peterk add a quote by chuck palahniuk
item.description: "She's not wearing makeup so her face just looks like skin." -- chuck palahniuk

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "We all have this moment, when your folks first see you as someone not growing up to be them." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "If you're ever in a big hotel lobby, and they start to play "The Blue Danube Waltz," get the hell out. Don't think. Run." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Peterk add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Yes, these are bruises from fighting and I'm okay with that." -- Chuck Palahniuk
